How much did I spend on the New Year's gift for my friend?

To find out how much was spent on the New Year's gift for your friend, we need to look at recent transactions. The `get_most_recent_transactions` function can provide a list of recent transactions. We will use this function to check for any transactions related to the New Year's gift.
